backend/main.mo: Main actor defines school, teacher, training, and review types with CRUD-style add and query methods backed by Map and List collections.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module clones old state and injects demo schools on upgrade if missing.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata describing a frontend change to add retry behavior for the Directory error state.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including pages, components, hooks, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables for global theming.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and renders the app layout with header, footer, theming, and toasts.
frontend/src/components/directory/School: Renders a school card with image, location, training badges, teacher count, and navigation to the detail page.
frontend/src/components/directory/Teache: Displays a list of teacher cards or an empty-state message when no teachers are available.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with navigation links, contact info, current year, and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with logo, navigation (desktop and mobile), and a theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/school/AboutScho: Displays an About section for a school with default generated text when none is provided.
frontend/src/components/school/faqConten: Exports a list of static FAQ items with questions and answers for school pages.
frontend/src/components/school/FAQSectio: Renders a FAQ list using an accordion UI inside a card.
frontend/src/components/school/ImageGall: Photo gallery with default images and a modal viewer for selected images.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolMap: Shows a Google Maps embed and link for a school location or a fallback message if missing.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolRev: Displays school reviews, average rating, and a form for authenticated users to submit new reviews.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolTra: Lists a school's training courses with hours, duration estimates, descriptions, and navigation to curriculum pages.
frontend/src/components/school/SchoolVid: Renders a card that extracts a YouTube video ID from various URL formats and embeds it, or shows a fallback message.
frontend/src/components/school/SimilarSc: Displays similar schools using a custom hook with loading, empty, and populated states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user’s Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolCardData.ts: Fetches a school’s trainings and teachers via the backend actor for summary card displays.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolDetails.ts: Retrieves full school details, teachers, and trainings with loading and error aggregation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchoolReviews.ts: Loads reviews for a school and provides a mutation to submit new reviews with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchools.ts: Fetches all schools and optionally filters them by matching training hours, including per-school training retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimilarSchools.ts: Computes similar schools by comparing training hours to the current school and returns top matches.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrainingCurriculum: Loads a school and a specific training for curriculum pages with combined loading and error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global styles.
frontend/src/lib/backendDiagnostics.ts: Provides a function to log structured diagnostic information for backend call failures.
frontend/src/lib/schoolThumbnails.ts: Implements a deterministic hash-based selector to map school IDs to one of several thumbnail image paths.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, features, and informational cards for the yoga school directory.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information and a non-functional placeholder contact form within styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Shows the school directory with filter options, loading and error states, and a list of school cards.
frontend/src/pages/SchoolDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed school information including courses, teachers, reviews, and media sections.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitClaimSchoolPage: Static informational page showing options to submit or claim a school, with disabled buttons and guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/TrainingCurriculumPag: Displays detailed training curriculum data with loading, error states, metadata, and generated highlights.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing requirements, existing features, and persistent issues loading school data.
